Package common.dataClasses

Class CartItem

java.lang.Object
common.dataClasses.Asset
common.dataClasses.Item
common.dataClasses.CartItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
IData, java.io.Serializable
public class CartItem
extends Item
Represents an item in cart - a version of an asset that is considered to be placed into an order, at a certain quantity and price.
See Also:
Serialized Form

      Initialises the asset in cart.

      price - The unit price of the asset.
